UniprotID	Q8N8V4
Accession	Q8N8V4
EntryName	ANS4B_HUMAN
ProteinName	Ankyrin repeat and SAM domain-containing protein 4B (Harmonin-interacting ankyrin repeat-containing protein) (Harp)
GeneName	ANKS4B HARP
Length	417
Function	As part of the intermicrovillar adhesion complex/IMAC plays a role in epithelial brush border differentiation, controlling microvilli organization and length. Plays a role in assembly of the complex (PubMed:26812018). May play a role in cellular response to endoplasmic reticulum stress (By similarity).
Subcellular Location	Cell projection; Microvillus
